dialog.text: It’s cloudy in the upper-half of the image and grass in the middle part. There’s also bush in the bottom. And there is a river between grass and bush that separates them.
How many clouds on the sky? and how big the river is?
The sky is full of clouds and the sky is grey. The river and the bush are of the same width, both tools 1/8 of the image.
is there anything else in the image?
The cloud in the sky is very puffy. And the river is horizontal, not vertical.
what is the shape of the bush?
It forms a small triangle at the bottom right of the image.
is the river separate the grass only or the bush? is the bush only appear at the bottom part?
Yes the bush is only at the bottom right.  And there are trees above the river at the right.
how big are the size of the trees?
It’s height and width is of the width of the river.
